parameters.name: OSSBucket
parameters.description: The OSS bucket to which you want to export the image.

parameters.name: OSSPrefix
parameters.description: The prefix of the object as which you want to store the image in the OSS bucket. The prefix must be 1 to 30 characters in length and can contain digits and letters.

parameters.name: OSSRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region.

Valid values:

*   cn-beijing

parameters.name: RoleName
parameters.description: The name of the Resource Access Management (RAM) role.
